video_prompt: A confident anime woman in a futuristic setting, her hand moves to draw a pistol, eyes tracking unseen motion. Mechanical structures behind her subtly shift and glow.
image_prompt: Anime girl, short dark hair, brown eyes, fair skin, salmon-pink top, denim shorts, tan gloves, large headphones, holding futuristic silver and black handgun, standing confidently in front of large, detailed orange mechanical structures, vibrant orange background, futuristic off-white and orange high-heeled boots, sci-fi, mecha elements, bright even lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Her hand smoothly sweeps to draw a weapon, eyes sharply tracking an unseen presence, a determined expression forming. Behind her, intricate mechanical structures subtly reconfigure their geometry, their internal lights actively pulsing and glowing.
